data.title: 29 B Ltd. Lady
data.meta_description: Advanced battery integration, improved control, and total comfort: All of these aspects define the women’s Torrent INT e70 Ltd, whose new Bosch Performance Line motor ensures a range of more than 100 km*. The compact Bosch drive unit features a reduced weight, very low noise, and high power. The aluminium frame with inner cable routing was freshly re-designed: Fun Ride geometry will allow you to tame a trail, ride up and down hills not tried before, and spend all day on the saddle. The bike is equipped by mounting points for accessories like mudguards, kickstand or carrier: together, all of these items make the Torrent touring-ready.
data.text:
Ready for those conditions

Advanced battery integration, improved control, and total comfort: All of these aspects define the women’s Torrent INT e70 Ltd, whose new Bosch Performance Line motor ensures a range of more than 100 km*. The compact Bosch drive unit features a reduced weight, very low noise, and high power. The aluminium frame with inner cable routing was freshly re-designed: Fun Ride geometry will allow you to tame a trail, ride up and down hills not tried before, and spend all day on the saddle. The bike is equipped by mounting points for accessories like mudguards, kickstand or carrier: together, all of these items make the Torrent touring-ready.

Highlights

NEW frame with Fun Ride Geometry to increase Comfort&Control and to make uphills and downhills easier

Bosch Performance Line e-drive with 250 W and 65 Nm

500 Wh integrated battery with a range up to 100 km

Shimano Altus 1×9, 38 × 11-36, 327 %

Manufacturers reserve the right to vary speciﬁations, including colors, with or without notice at such times in such manner as deemed appropriate. Major as well as minor changes may be involved. Every effort, however, is made to ensure the accuracy of the particulars contained in this presentation. Consult your Dealer for details regarding the specifications of any featured product. This presentation shall not constitute - under any circumstances whatsoever - an offer by the Company to any individual. All sales are made by the Distributor or Dealer subject to and with the beneﬁt of the standard Conditions of Sale and Warranty provided by the Distributor or Dealer, copies of which may be obtained upon request. While efforts are made to ensure speciﬁcation accuracy cannot always immediately reﬂect either change in speciﬁcation or in some isolated cases the provision of a particular feature. Customers are always advised to discuss speciﬁc details with the supplying Dealer, especially if a selection is dependent upon one of the features advertised.
